channel.title: [317] Need Help, Just a simple thing i don't know :D
channel.description:
Ok, well hi guys, i don't get declare this, how do i declare this code?? where? i searched Public void run() in client.java but nothing, help im confused, to be honest i don't know what to do fully.
Step 3: Go into your server folder, locate and open client.java Go to your run method( Public void run() )
Declare this:
[code]int UID = inStream.readDWord();[/code] You have to declare UID so that the server knows what a UID is.

item.title: [317] Need Help, Just a simple thing i don't know :D
item.dc:creator: @NewbieNewty Newty
item.description:
@NewbieNewty wrote:

            [CODE]
            public void run() {
	int UID = inStream.readDWord();[/CODE]

item.title: [317] Need Help, Just a simple thing i don't know :D
item.dc:creator: @Barrage1 Denoria
item.description:
@Barrage1 wrote:

Ok, well hi guys, i don’t get declare this, how do i declare this code?? where? i searched Public void run() in client.java but nothing, help im confused, to be honest i don’t know what to do fully.

Step 3:
Go into your server folder, locate and open client.java
Go to your run method( Public void run() )

Declare this:

int UID = inStream.readDWord();

You have to declare UID so that the server knows what a UID is.
